contents.item: Life is a rich literature.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: This life is not perfect, live it to the full, it's all we have
contents.owner: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

contents.item: Don't wait for the right moment to start, start and make each moment right.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: To learn something new, you need to try new things and not be afraid to be wrong.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: There is a difference between how you live your life, and what you do with your life.
contents.owner: Abhijit Naskar

contents.item: What helps you persevere is your resilience and commitment.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Never lose hope. Storms make people stronger and never last forever.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: All humans are rogues. Cured only by death.
contents.owner: Fakeer Ishavardas

contents.item: Until you change how you get things done, you'll never know what works best.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Then that's what the Northern Lights are. All the lives that we're not living.
contents.owner: Adi Alsaid, Let's Get Lost

contents.item: Life will be empty without great stories to read.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: We all die. Not all of us live.
contents.owner: Edie Littlefield Sundby, The Mission Walker: I was given three months to live...

contents.item: Why don't we pay more attention to little children and be nice to each other.
contents.owner: Nurudeen Ushawu

contents.item: One can not come back from life.
contents.owner: Ljupka Cvetanova, The New Land

contents.item: You feel most fulfilled when your actions are filled with meaning. Find meaning to find yourself.
contents.owner: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

contents.item: Make improvements, not excuses. Seek respect, not attention.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: I am fighting to stay alive not because I fear death, but because I love life.
contents.owner: Edie Littlefield Sundby, The Mission Walker: I was given three months to live...

contents.item: No one has ever achieved greatness without dreams.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: While we insists on destroying the world, God is doing incredible things to save it.
contents.owner: Nurudeen Ushawu

contents.item: Sometimes the only way to ever find yourself is to get completely lost.
contents.owner: Kellie Elmore

contents.item: Failures are the stairs we climb to reach success.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Don’t wait for things to happen. Make them happen.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Do good, live in the most positive and joyful way possible every day.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: To overcome fear is the quickest way to gain your self-confidence.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: The circumstances surrounding your birth is not as important as the opportunity to live life.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Before defining what you want, know who you are.
contents.owner: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

contents.item: If you want to live your life to the fullest you must start believing in yourself today.
contents.owner: Nurudeen Ushawu

contents.item: Any idea of separation is bondage. True liberation of the mind is in non-differentiation.
contents.owner: Abhijit Naskar, Love, God & Neurons: Memoir of a scientist who found himself by getting lost

contents.item: Life is too short to waste your time on people who don’t respect, appreciate, and value you.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: If you believe very strongly in something, stand up and fight for it.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Live every single moment of your life, for the one thing that is most precious to you.
contents.owner: Abhijit Naskar

contents.item: Change course, but don’t give up.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Life experiences shared with a friend will turn into memories to be enjoyed.
contents.owner: James Hauenstein

contents.item: When you compete, you gain more than you lose, even when you lose.
contents.owner: Aaron Lauritsen

contents.item: Open the window of your mind. Allow the fresh air,new lights and new truths to enter.
contents.owner: Amit Ray, Walking the Path of Compassion

contents.item: Be brave and take risks… You don't have to have it all figured out to move forward.
contents.owner: Roy  Bennett

contents.item: Nourish your Nature. Be who you are meant to be.
contents.owner: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

contents.item: Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Your own shortcomings are the best ground to grow your sense of humor.
contents.owner: Stu Konigsberg

contents.item: The easiest way to be reborn is to live and feel life everyday
contents.owner: Munia Khan

contents.item: Be careful because brazen behavior and a powerful mind can hide a delicate heart.
contents.owner: Imania Margria

contents.item: You be good. That's your business. The rest, leave to God. That's his business.
contents.owner: Fakeer Ishavardas

contents.item: Don't believe everything you are told, if it resonates within you, then listen and act.
contents.owner: Avis J. Williams

contents.item: Be yourself. Don't worry about what other people are thinking of you.
contents.owner: Phil Lester

contents.item: You cannot change the past, but you can make a difference now
contents.owner: Avis J. Williams

contents.item: When you hoard knowledge, you deprive yourself of blessings and growth.
contents.owner: Kemi Sogunle

contents.item: Dream your own dreams, achieve your own goals. Your journey is your own and unique.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: A loud smile is often a fake laugh.
contents.owner: Saahil Prem

contents.item: Do not let the roles you play in life make you forget who you are.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Were I but perfectly normal, I would just not be.
contents.owner: Fakeer Ishavardas

contents.item: Some fish love to swim upstream. Some people love to overcome challenges.
contents.owner: Amit Ray, Walking the Path of Compassion

contents.item: Integrity is doing the right thing when nobody's watching, and doing as you say you would do.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Nothing looked the same, and everything looked the same.
contents.owner: Jacqueline Simon Gunn, What He Didn't See

contents.item: Let the improvement of yourself keep you so busy that you have no time to criticize others.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Learning can never be quantified with a flawed educational unit.
contents.owner: Louise Philippe Dulay

contents.item: The most important lessons are learned during the process. Pay attention to the process.
contents.owner: Kemi Sogunle, Beyond the Pain by Kemi Sogunle

contents.item: Turn your obstacles into opportunities and your problems into possibilities.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: It is a rule of life that we eventually become victims of the evil we do to others.
contents.owner: Wayne Gerard Trotman

contents.item: Whoever said that money didn't buy happiness was a damn fool. A damn fool who'd never been poor.
contents.owner: Tom Cooper, The Marauders

contents.item: Most of us must learn to love people and use things rather than loving things and using people.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Life has a meaning but do not set out to find out. Just live it out.
contents.owner: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

contents.item: Your life is your choice, so make it worthwhile
contents.owner: Wennie Lin

contents.item: Change may not always bring growth, but there is no growth without change.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Let go of something old that no longer serves you to make room for something new.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: The more you learn, the more you want to learn.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: There are more things in our biology that make us one, than there are to set us apart.
contents.owner: Abhijit Naskar, Love, God & Neurons: Memoir of a scientist who found himself by getting lost

contents.item: Let go of something old that no longer serves you in order to make room for something new.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Travelling unveils new dimensions of this world not known to the naked eye.
contents.owner: Wayne Chirisa

contents.item: Don't over-focus on the negatives and under-focus the positives in your life.
contents.owner: Lalah Delia

contents.item: When you take control of your attitude, you take control of your life.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Someone wise told me recently that Adulting was hard. My response: TRUE STORY
contents.owner: Sonya Watson

contents.item: It takes guts and humility to admit mistakes. Admitting we're wrong is courage, not weakness.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Maturity is when you stop complaining and making excuses, and start making changes.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: People throw stones at you and you convert them into milestones.
contents.owner: Sachin Tendulkar

contents.item: Embracing change can be daunting, but it is our willingness to do better that makes it worthwhile.
contents.owner: Peprah Boasiako

contents.item: Instead of worrying about what you cannot control, shift your energy to what you can create.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: The older I get the more I realize that the only permanent thing in life is what we have within us
contents.owner: Dr. Jacinta Mpalyenkana, Ph.D, MBA

contents.item: Life is short. Focus on what really matters most. You have to change your priorities over time.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Great goals make great people. People cannot hit what they do not aim for.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: All our wisdom is stored in the trees.
contents.owner: Santosh Kalwar

contents.item: You have two choices, to conquer your fear or to let your fear conquer you.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: The beginning is always NOW.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: It takes sunshine and rain to make a rainbow. There would be no rainbows without sunshine and rain.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: If your actions don't excite, motivate or inspire others to do better, you're doing it wrong.
contents.owner: Peprah Boasiako

contents.item: A rich life is lived from a giving heart not a selfish mind.
contents.owner: Rasheed Ogunlaru

contents.item: Life changes us. To wish otherwise is pointless.
contents.owner: Nalini Singh, Angels Of Darkness

contents.item: Everything starts from inside of us, then comes outside of us.
contents.owner: Avis J. Williams

contents.item: It is better to do the will of God than seek your own ways.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita

contents.item: Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart
